name: Free SQL Performance Monitor
short_description:
This tool, also known as SQLXL, is a collection of SQL scripts that monitor performance counters and individual queries on your SQL servers. It sends out daily and weekly reports identifying performance bottlenecks and tuning opportunities. Alerts can also be configured to notify you in real-time, via email and SMS (BETA) when issues are detected.

This project's goal is to provide you with the tools you need to identify performance issues and resolve them before they impact your users.

Click the Files link to download the scripts.

Open a case at https://sqlxl.zendesk.com if you need any assistance with your tuning.
summary: Free SQL scripts to monitor your SQL server and alert you of problems.

database.fullpath: Database Environment :: Network-based DBMS :: Microsoft SQL Server
